sentences.sContent: Improving the service level and quality of cicerone team needs joint efforts from government, industry, consensus and tourism enterprises to establish a management system according to market laws.
sentences.sContent_eng: Improving the service level and quality of cicerone team needs joint efforts from government, industry, consensus and tourism enterprises to establish a management system according to market laws.
sentences.sCn: 改善和提高导游人员的服务质量与水平需要政府、行业和旅游企业共同努力，建立一个符合市场规律的管理体系。

trans.tranOther: a person who conducts and informs sightseers; a tour guide
